2026-01-30.content:
Folder level and organization level support for the [quota adjuster feature](https://docs.cloud.google.com/docs/quotas/quota-adjuster) is available in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages) through the
[Cloud Quotas API](https://docs.cloud.google.com/docs/quotas/reference/rest/v1beta/projects.locations.quotaAdjusterSettings),
[gcloud quotas beta](https://cloud.google.com/sdk/gcloud/reference/beta/quotas/adjuster/settings)
CLI, [Terraform](https://docs.cloud.google.com/docs/quotas/terraform-support-for-cloud-quotas), and
[Cloud Client Libraries](https://docs.cloud.google.com/docs/quotas/reference/libraries). For more
information, see the documentation about how to [enable the quota adjuster](https://docs.cloud.google.com/docs/quotas/quota-adjuster#enable) through the Cloud Quotas API.

summary.title: Quota Adjuster Now Supports Folders and Organizations
summary.summary: The quota adjuster feature, now in Preview, extends support to folder and organization levels. You can manage these settings via the Cloud Quotas API, gcloud CLI, Terraform, and Cloud Client Libraries. This enhancement simplifies quota management across your entire resource hierarchy.
